extensionDescription.message: Changes the color of Chrome theme to match the website’s appearance.

reinstallTip.message: Preference data could be corrupted. If the issue persists, please re-install the add-on. Apologies for your inconvenience!

allowLightTabBarTooltip.message: Allow tab bar to use bright color (dark text on light tab bar).

allowDarkTabBarTooltip.message: Allow tab bar to use dark color (light text on dark tab bar).

dynamicModeTooltip.message: Keeps updating tab bar color while browsing within a web page.

ignoreDesignatedThemeColourTooltip.message: Some websites provide a theme color themselves. Turn on this option to ignore these colors.

minimumContrastTooltip.message: Set the minimum contrast ratio between the tab bar and text. The tab bar color adjusts automatically if the ratio is unmet.

settingsAreExported.message: Settings have been exported to your download folder.

importFailed.message: Failed to import settings. Please try again.

confirmResetThemeBuilder.message: Are you sure you want to reset the theme builder?

confirmResetSiteList.message: Are you sure you want to reset the site list?

confirmResetAdvanced.message: Are you sure you want to reset the advanced settings?

reportAnIssue.message: Report an issue / submit a suggestion / translate this add-on

pageIsProtected.message: This page is protected by browser

colourForPlainTextViewer.message: Using color for plain text viewer

errorOccured.message: An error occurred, using fallback color

colourForHomePage.message: Tab bar color for home page can be configured in settings

useDefaultColourForAddon.message: Using specified color for pages related to

useRecommendedColourForAddon.message: Recommended color for pages related to

specifyColourForAddon.message: Click “Specify a color” to open settings and specify tab bar color for pages related to

specifyColourForAddonTitle.message: Open settings and specify a color to pages related to the add-on

themeColourIsUnignored.message: Theme color defined by the website is used, instead of being ignored by default

themeColourNotFound.message: Theme color is not found, color is picked from the web page

themeColourIsIgnored.message: Theme color defined by the website is ignored

useThemeColourTitle.message: Use theme color defined by the website

colourIsPickedFrom.message: Color is picked from an HTML element matching

cannotFindElement.message: Cannot find the HTML element matching

cannotFindElementEnd.message: , color is picked from the web page instead

errorOccuredLocatingElement.message: An error occurred while looking for the HTML element matching

errorOccuredLocatingElementEnd.message: , color is picked from the web page instead

colourIsSpecified.message: Color for this site is specified in the settings

usingThemeColour.message: Using theme color defined by the website

ignoreThemeColourTitle.message: Ignore theme color defined by the website

usingFallbackColour.message: No color is available, using fallback color

colourPickedFromWebpage.message: Color is picked from the web page

colourIsAdjusted.message: The original color has been adjusted to ensure minimum contrast
